pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a stunning time-lapse video capturing a dramatic night scene from the perspective of a large container ship at sea. The sky is filled with a brilliant display of the Milky Way and countless stars. Below the star-filled expanse, flashes of lightning illuminate clouds on the horizon, creating a powerful contrast over the dark ocean.
